name: Assteroids (Plsdnt7)
description:
Assteroids is a simple arcade game made for the Finally Finish Something 2022 Game jam, in Assteroids you take control of an Alien in space and you need to help him dodge some asteroids to not die.

Coding and Art by Afonso Borges

Game made using the Godot game engine

Art made using Krita

Warning, this game contains flashing lights!

have fun!
